1556340.name: Jamir
1556340.description:
BASE WARS MODE


Three teams will join base wars and one team who damages the main generator most will take the control of the main base, if the leader team can survive in front of the other two teams for a particular time, base wars will end and the champion team will be awarded with gems. You can join 15, 30, 45, 60 or 75 player base wars matches based on two view types which are FPP and TPP. Base wars starts automatically when enough match players enter.

DEATHMATCH FREE FOR ALL

The goal is to kill the other players as many times as possible in 10 minutes per round. Killing upgraded & stronger players will let you earn more gems.

TEAM DEATHMATCH

The goal is to kill the other team players as many times as possible in 10 minutes per round. Killing upgraded & stronger players will let you earn more gems.

SURVIVAL

It is a co-op game mode where players has to survive creature waves as much as possible. There are 3 types of creatures and killing each type will let you earn different amount of gems also based on the wave strength.
1556340.supported_languages:
英语*, 土耳其语, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 繁体中文*, 日语*, 韩语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 俄语*, 印地语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
